name: Beast Arena
description:
Enter the Beast Arena, a short fast paced monster slayer game. Fight through waves of enemies of varying difficulty and amounts. Craft different items to survive the nonstop onslaught of beasts you will encounter.

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Pickup Item - E
  • Attack - Left Mouse Click
  • Inventory - Tab
  • Dash - Spacebar
  • Sprint - LeftShift

Mechanics:

  • Craft items by dragging them on top of each other in the inventory menu
  • Attacking reduces your equipped item's durability, after it reaches 0, the item is destroyed!
  • Enemies get stronger each wave, make sure to upgrade your weapons to be prepared.

Developed for JamCraft 5.

Programming and Models - Ji_Rath

Art and Animation - Jaguilar

Music - Jade
